mention.text: : Poor little orphan boy of five , the city smoke and grime Taint every cooling breeze
Poor little orphan boy of five
Poor little orphan boy of five
often in his dreams The angels
a sandy beach where all the rich folks send Their little boys and girls to play , a barrel is his boat , But , oh , the air is tifling and the dust fills up his throat
